channel.title: List of Secure Computation Papers
channel.description: A list of papers on IACR eprint on the topic of secure computation.

item.description: Megha Byali and Arun Joseph and Arpita Patra and Divya Ravi

item.title: Function Secret Sharing: Improvements and Extensions
item.description: Elette Boyle and Niv Gilboa and Yuval Ishai

item.title: Efficient 3-Party Distributed ORAM
item.description: Paul Bunn and Jonathan Katz and Eyal Kushilevitz and Rafail Ostrovsky

item.title: New Protocols for Secure Linear Algebra: Pivoting-Free Elimination and Fast Block-Recursive Matrix Decomposition

item.title: Practical Accountability of Secret Processes
item.description: Jonathan Frankle and Sunoo Park and Daniel Shaar and Shafi Goldwasser and Daniel J. Weitzner
